<template>
  <!--<v-container v-if="loading">
    <v-layout align-center justify-center>
      <v-progress-circular :size="200" :width="10" color="primary" indeterminate></v-progress-circular>
    </v-layout>
  </v-container>-->
  <v-container fluid class="pa-0">
    <v-parallax :src="backdropUrl + singleMovie.backdrop_path"
    >

    </v-parallax>
    <v-row no-gutters align="end" justify="center">
      <v-col cols="2" style="position:relative; margin-top: -330px;">
        <v-img :src="imgUrl + singleMovie.poster_path" max-width="272" max-height="408"></v-img>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="4">
        One of three columnsioawjdoiawjdoiwadoijoaijdwoijdoiajdoiwajodiajoaiwjoidjwaoijdoawijdoaiwjdoijwdoij
      </v-col>

    </v-row>
    <v-parallax id="my-lax" src="https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/parallax/material.jpg"></v-parallax>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
    import MovieService from "@/services/MovieApi";

    export default {
        props: ["id"],
        data() {
            return {
                singleMovie: "",
                loading: true,
                imgUrl: "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original",
                backdropUrl: "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w1920_and_h800_multi_faces"
            };
        },
        mounted() {
            MovieService.fetchSingleMovie(this.id)
                .then(response => {
                    this.singleMovie = response;
                    this.loading = false;
                })
                .catch(error => {
                    console.log(error);
                });
        },
        methods: {
            back() {
                this.$router.push("/latestmovies");
            }
        }
    };
</script>

<style scoped>
  .v-parallax__content {
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, black, transparent);
  }
</style>
